headline: EDWARDS HELIUM LEAK DETECTOR
categories.lvl1: Vacuum Processing Equipment > Helium Leak Detectors
specstable:
Manufacturer Edwards Veeco
Model Spectron 600T (MS-40)
High Vacuum Pump Type Turbomolecular Pump
Minimum Detectable Helium Leak Rate 4.0E-11 atm-cc/sec
Maximum Detectable Leak Rate 1.00E-4 atm-cc/sec
Maximum Permissible Inlet Pressure 10.00 mbar (7.50 torr)
Roughing Pump Capacity 84.49 l/m (2.99 CFM)
Test Port Connection KF25
Start Up Time 4 Min.
Interface RS 232
Detectable Masses 3 AMU 4 AMU
Internal Calibrated Leak Included
Other Information

Also known as Veeco MS-40
Helium Mass 3 & 4
Sensitivity 4E-11 std air cc/sec direct mode
4E-10 std air cc/sec reverse mode
External roughing kit included

  • RV8 Mechanical pump
  • ER600 Valve and tee assembly
  • Units cart has casters
Power Requirements 115 V 10.0 A 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Condition Very Good
Exterior Dimensions
Width 20.500 in (52.1 cm)
Depth 14.500 in (36.8 cm)
Height 17.000 in (43.2 cm)
Weight 291 lb (132 kg)
